title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.37 - Consolidation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.37 - Consolidation

State Regulations

If two school districts are consolidated, the
apportionments due both for the current year shall be paid to the consolidated
district. If an academy becomes the academic department of a union free school
district by lease or adoption, the apportionment due to the academy for the
current year shall be paid to such district where it appears that the work is
satisfactorily continued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
